nodes.text: The Pantoran Guard was a group of Pantoran soldiers that were assigned to protect the Pantoran Assembly.

The Guard wore uniforms corresponding to the livery of the Pantoran Assembly, with their berets bearing the Guard's symbol. Ceremonial blaster rifles were carried in sheaths and the Guard were also proficient with DC-15S pistols.

Chairman Chi Cho chose two loyal guards to accompany him on his mission to Orto Plutonia. During the battle there, both Pantoran Guards fought valiantly despite their poor defensive position and were killed.
